motor.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the part of a machine that makes it work or move, by changing power, especially electrical power, into movement
motor.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: That’s a nice motor you’ve got, Dave.
motor.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: relating to cars or other vehicles with engines
motor.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: relating to nerves that make muscles move
motor.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Bertie is motoring down from London.
